page.title: 11HART OF LISBURN
page.content:
HART OF LISBURN
Ravarnette Primary School had published this year the Book, "Hart Of Lisburn" by Stanley Bell. ISBN 0 948391 00 6. Retail price 3.50
It was a direct result of the senior pupils winning the Lagan Shield with their entry on the life of Sir Robert Hart who used to live in Ravarnette House.
He was born in Portadown in 1835 and died in Fingest Grove, England 1911.
The book is published under the name of the Lisburn Historical Press.
His diaries are in Queens University Library.
